name: Overbuilding
description:
Игра создана на ГК Джеме от Индикатора.

Game about capturing area for your city. You can change old instruments in your panel to new. For each star you get new cunstruction tool.

For use tool in the game drag it to the area or click on house with tool.

Credits:

  • Icons created by delapouite.com (game-icons.net)
  • GUI elements, tiles and buildings from opengameart.org
